name: Alive (itch) (George Flude)
description:
Alive was for a Uni project that had us using Blueprinting in Unreal to Greybox and then polish a short game, showcasing a few mechanics.

I wanted to focus my game on finding ways to present a narrative in a subtle way, with minimal instruction. 

The majority of assets were also made by me, with a few Unreal standard assets.
